name: LifeZ - Survival
description: LifeZ - Survival is a third-person sandbox-survival game. Build your hideout, search for water and food, mine resources and fight against zombies and finally find ways to contact the outside world and leave Catastrophie Area.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 duo or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: HD 5xxx series or greater DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1024 MB available space Sound Card: Optional
